trans-unit.source: The composedPath() method of the Event interface returns the event’s path which is an array of the objects on which listeners will be invoked. This does not include nodes in shadow trees if the shadow root was created with its ShadowRoot.mode closed.
trans-unit.target: Event 接口的 composedPath() 方法返回事件的路径，该路径是将在其上调用侦听器的对象的数组。如果影子根是在关闭 ShadowRoot.mode 的情况下创建的，则这不包括影子树中的节点。

trans-unit.source: The computeFrame() method, shown below, is responsible for actually fetching a frame of data and performing the chroma-keying effect.
trans-unit.target: 所述 computeFrame() 方法，如下所示，是负责实际读取数据的帧并进行色度键控效果。

trans-unit.source: The computedStyleMap() method of the Element interface returns a StylePropertyMapReadOnly interface which provides a read-only representation of a CSS declaration block that is an alternative to CSSStyleDeclaration.
trans-unit.target: 所述 computedStyleMap() 的方法 Element 接口返回 StylePropertyMapReadOnly 接口，其提供了一个CSS声明块是一个替代的只读表示 CSSStyleDeclaration 。

trans-unit.source: The coneInnerAngle property of the PannerNode interface is a double value describing the angle, in degrees, of a cone inside of which there will be no volume reduction.
trans-unit.target: PannerNode 接口的 coneInnerAngle 属性是一个双精度值，以度为单位描述圆锥体的角度，在该圆锥体内部不会减小体积。

trans-unit.source: The coneInnerAngle property's default value is 360, suitable for a non-directional source.
trans-unit.target: 该 coneInnerAngle 属性的默认值是 360 ，适于非定向源。

trans-unit.source: The coneOuterAngle property of the PannerNode interface is a double value describing the angle, in degrees, of a cone outside of which the volume will be reduced by a constant value, defined by the coneOuterGain property.
trans-unit.target: PannerNode 接口的 coneOuterAngle 属性是一个双精度值，它描述圆锥的角度（以度为单位），在该圆锥的外部，其体积将减小一个常量值，该值由 coneOuterGain 属性定义。

trans-unit.source: The coneOuterAngle property's default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 该 coneOuterAngle 属性的默认值是 0 。

trans-unit.source: The coneOuterGain property has been given a value outside the accepted range (0–1).
trans-unit.target: 所述 coneOuterGain 属性已经给出了可接受的范围（0-1）之外的值。

trans-unit.source: The coneOuterGain property of the PannerNode interface is a double value, describing the amount of volume reduction outside the cone, defined by the coneOuterAngle attribute.
trans-unit.target: 所述 coneOuterGain 所述的属性 PannerNode 接口是一个双精度值，描述所述锥体外容积减少的量，由定义的 coneOuterAngle 属性。

trans-unit.source: The coneOuterGain property's default value is 0, meaning that no sound can be heard outside the cone.
trans-unit.target: 该 coneOuterGain 属性的默认值是 0 ，这意味着没有任何声音可以锥外面听到。

trans-unit.source: The configuration includes changed identity information, but the connection already has identity information specified. This happens if configuration.peerIdentity or configuration.certificates is set and their values differ from the current configuration.
trans-unit.target: 该 configuration 包括更改的身份信息，但是连接已经指定了身份信息。如果设置了 configuration.peerIdentity 或 configuration.certificates ，并且其值与当前配置不同，则会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The configuration read only property of the USBDevice interface returns a USBConfiguration object for the currently selected interface for a paired USB device.
trans-unit.target: USBDevice 接口的 configuration 只读属性为配对的USB设备的当前选定接口返回 USBConfiguration 对象。

trans-unit.source: The configurations read only property of the USBDevice interface an array of device-specific interfaces for controlling a paired USB device.
trans-unit.target: 该 configurations 仅读取的属性 USBDevice 接口的 array 的特定于设备的接口，用于控制成对的USB设备。

trans-unit.source: The connect() method of the AudioNode interface lets you connect one of the node's outputs to a target, which may be either another AudioNode (thereby directing the sound data to the specified node) or an AudioParam, so that the node's output data is automatically used to change the value of that parameter over time.
trans-unit.target: AudioNode 接口的 connect() 方法使您可以将节点的输出之一连接到目标，该目标可以是另一个 AudioNode （从而将声音数据定向到指定的节点）或 AudioParam ，以便节点的输出数据自动用于随时间更改该参数的值。

trans-unit.source: The connectEnd read-only property returns the timestamp immediately after the browser finishes establishing the connection to the server to retrieve the resource. The timestamp value includes the time interval to establish the transport connection, as well as other time intervals such as SSL handshake and SOCKS authentication.
trans-unit.target: 当浏览器完成与服务器的连接以获取资源后， connectEnd 只读属性立即返回 timestamp 。时间戳值包括建立传输连接的时间间隔，以及其他时间间隔，例如SSL握手和SOCKS身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The connectStart read-only property returns the timestamp immediately before the user agent starts establishing the connection to the server to retrieve the resource.
trans-unit.target: 该 connectStart 只读属性返回的 timestamp 马上用户代理开始建立连接到服务器，以获取资源之前。

trans-unit.source: The console.assert() method was implemented differently in older Node.js versions than the console.assert() method available in browsers. In browsers, calling console.assert() with a falsy assertion prints message to the console without interrupting execution of subsequent code. Before Node.js v10.0.0, however, a falsy assertion would also cause an AssertionError to be thrown. This discrepancy was fixed with Node v10, so that console.assert() now acts the same in both Node and the browser.
trans-unit.target: 该 console.assert() 方法是在年长的Node.js版本比实现方式不同 console.assert() 在浏览器中可用的方法。在浏览器中，使用虚假断言调用 console.assert() 会将 message 打印到控制台，而不会中断后续代码的执行。但是，在Node.js v10.0.0之前，虚假的断言还会导致引发 AssertionError 。 Node v10修复了此差异，因此 console.assert() 现在在Node和浏览器中的行为相同。

trans-unit.source: The containerId readonly property of the TaskAttributionTiming interface returns the container's id attribute. A container is the iframe, embed or object etc. that is being implicated, on the whole, for a long task.
trans-unit.target: TaskAttributionTiming 接口的 containerId 只读属性返回容器的 id 属性。容器是iframe，嵌入对象或对象等，总体上涉及很长的任务。

trans-unit.source: The containerName readonly property of the TaskAttributionTiming interface returns the container's Name attribute. A container is the iframe, embed or object etc. that is being implicated, on the whole, for a long task.
trans-unit.target: TaskAttributionTiming 接口的 containerName 只读属性返回容器的 Name 属性。容器是iframe，嵌入对象或对象等，总体上涉及很长的任务。

trans-unit.source: The containerSrc readonly property of the TaskAttributionTiming interface returns the container's src attribute. A container is the iframe, embed or object etc. that is being implicated, on the whole, for a long task.
trans-unit.target: TaskAttributionTiming 接口的 containerSrc 只读属性返回容器的 src 属性。容器是iframe，嵌入对象或对象等，总体上涉及很长的任务。

trans-unit.source: The containerType readonly property of the TaskAttributionTiming interface returns the type of frame container, one of iframe, embed, or object.
trans-unit.target: TaskAttributionTiming 接口的 containerType 只读属性返回框架容器的类型，即 iframe ， embed 或 object 之一。

trans-unit.source: The contentDocument property has been added.
trans-unit.target: 该 contentDocument 属性已添加。

trans-unit.source: The contentType muse be a valid video MIME type.
trans-unit.target: 该 contentType 中 MUSE是一个有效的视频MIME类型。

trans-unit.source: The contentWindow property returns the Window object of an <iframe> element. You can use this Window object to access the iframe's document and its internal DOM. This attribute is read-only, but its properties can be manipulated like the global Window object.
trans-unit.target: 所述 contentWindow 属性返回窗口的对象的<iframe>元素。您可以使用此 Window 对象访问iframe的文档及其内部DOM。该属性是只读的，但是可以像全局 Window 对象一样操作其属性。

trans-unit.source: The context parameter was supported up until version 44, but has now been removed.
trans-unit.target: 在版本44之前一直支持 context 参数，但现在已将其删除。

trans-unit.source: The context parameter was supported up until version 57, but has now been removed.
trans-unit.target: 在57版之前一直支持 context 参数，但现在已将其删除。

trans-unit.source: The continue() method of the IDBCursor interface advances the cursor to the next position along its direction, to the item whose key matches the optional key parameter. If no key is specified, the cursor advances to the immediate next position, based on its direction.
trans-unit.target: IDBCursor 接口的 continue() 方法将光标沿其方向前进到下一个位置，到达键与可选键参数匹配的项。如果未指定任何键，则光标将根据其方向前进到下一个位置。

trans-unit.source: The continuePrimaryKey() method of the IDBCursor interface advances the cursor to the to the item whose key matches the key parameter as well as whose primary key matches the primary key parameter.
trans-unit.target: IDBCursor 接口的 continuePrimaryKey() 方法将光标移到键到与键参数匹配且主键与主键参数匹配的项目。

trans-unit.source: The continuous property of the SpeechRecognition interface controls whether continuous results are returned for each recognition, or only a single result.
trans-unit.target: SpeechRecognition 接口的 continuous 属性控制是为每个识别返回连续结果还是返回单个结果。

trans-unit.source: The controlTransferIn() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves with a USBInTransferResult when a command or status operation has been transmitted to the USB device.
trans-unit.target: 所述 controlTransferIn() 的方法 USBDevice 接口返回一个 promise 与一个做出决议 USBInTransferResult 当命令或状态的操作已被发送到USB设备。

trans-unit.source: The controlTransferOut() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves with a USBOutTransferResult when a command or status operation has been transmitted from the USB device.
trans-unit.target: USBDevice 接口的 controlTransferOut() 方法返回一个 promise ，当从USB设备发送了命令或状态操作后，该承诺将使用 USBOutTransferResult 进行解析。

trans-unit.source: The controller read-only property of the ServiceWorkerContainer interface returns a ServiceWorker object if its state is activated (the same object returned by ServiceWorkerRegistration.active). This property returns null if the request is a force refresh (Shift + refresh) or if there is no active worker.
trans-unit.target: 如果 activated 了 ServiceWorkerContainer 接口的状态，则该 controller 只读属性将返回 ServiceWorker 对象（由 ServiceWorkerRegistration.active 返回的同一对象）。如果请求是强制刷新（Shift +刷新）或没有活动的工作程序，则此属性返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: The controlsList property of the HTMLMediaElement interface returns a DOMTokenList that helps the user agent select what controls to show on the media element whenever the user agent shows its own set of controls. The DOMTokenList takes one or more of three possible values: nodownload, nofullscreen, and noremoteplayback.
trans-unit.target: HTMLMediaElement 接口的 controlsList 属性返回一个DOMTokenList，当用户代理显示其自己的控件集时，该DOMTokenList可帮助用户代理选择要在媒体元素上显示的控件。DOMTokenList采用以下三个可能值中的一个或多个：nodownload，nofullscreen和noremoteplayback。

trans-unit.source: The copyFromChannel() method of the AudioBuffer interface copies the audio sample data from the specified channel of the AudioBuffer to a specified Float32Array.
trans-unit.target: AudioBuffer 接口的 copyFromChannel() 方法将音频样本数据从 AudioBuffer 的指定通道复制到指定的 Float32Array 。

trans-unit.source: The copyToChannel() method of the AudioBuffer interface copies the samples to the specified channel of the AudioBuffer, from the source array.
trans-unit.target: 所述 copyToChannel() 的方法 AudioBuffer 接口份样品到的指定通道 AudioBuffer ，从源阵列。

trans-unit.source: The count() method of the IDBIndex interface returns an IDBRequest object, and in a separate thread, returns the number of records within a key range.
trans-unit.target: IDBIndex 接口的 count() 方法返回 IDBRequest 对象，并在单独的线程中返回键范围内的记录数。

trans-unit.source: The count() method of the IDBObjectStore interface returns an IDBRequest object, and, in a separate thread, returns the total number of records that match the provided key or IDBKeyRange. If no arguments are provided, it returns the total number of records in the store.
trans-unit.target: IDBObjectStore 接口的 count() 方法返回一个 IDBRequest 对象，并在一个单独的线程中返回与提供的键或 IDBKeyRange 匹配的记录总数。如果未提供任何参数，它将返回存储中的记录总数。

trans-unit.source: The country read-only property of the PaymentAddress interface is a string identifying the address's country using the ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 standard. The string is always in its canonical upper-case form.
trans-unit.target: PaymentAddress 接口的 country 只读属性是一个字符串，使用ISO 3166-1 alpha-2标准标识地址的国家/地区。字符串始终为规范的大写形式。

trans-unit.source: The create() method of the CredentialsContainer interface returns a Promise that resolves with a new Credential instance based on the provided options, or null if no Credential object can be created.
trans-unit.target: CredentialsContainer 接口的 create() 方法返回一个 Promise ，该Promise将基于提供的选项使用新的 Credential 实例进行解析，如果无法创建 Credential 对象，则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: The create and exclusive options were both true, indicating that the directory should be created but must not already exist, but the directory does in fact already exist.
trans-unit.target: 在 create 和 exclusive 选项都是 true ，这表明该目录应该被创建，但绝不能存在，但目录是否确实已经存在。

trans-unit.source: The create and exclusive options were both true, indicating that the file should be created but must not already exist, but the file does in fact already exist.
trans-unit.target: 在 create 和 exclusive 选项都是 true ，这表明该文件应该被创建，但必须不存在，但文件是否确实已经存在。

trans-unit.source: The create option was not specified (or was specified as false), and the directory doesn't exist.
trans-unit.target: 在 create 选项未指定（或指定为 false ），而该目录不存在。

trans-unit.source: The create option was not specified (or was specified as false), and the file doesn't exist.
trans-unit.target: 在 create 选项未指定（或指定为 false ），并且该文件不存在。

trans-unit.source: The create property on the FileSystemFlags dictionary is used to indicate whether or not the file should be created if it's missing. FileSystemFlags is only used when calling FileSystemDirectoryEntry.getFile() or FileSystemDirectoryEntry.getDirectory().
trans-unit.target: 在 create 的财产 FileSystemFlags 字典用于指示是否应将文件如果缺少创建。 FileSystemFlags 仅在调用 FileSystemDirectoryEntry.getFile() 或 FileSystemDirectoryEntry.getDirectory() 时使用。

trans-unit.source: The createAnalyser() method of the BaseAudioContext interface creates an AnalyserNode, which can be used to expose audio time and frequency data and create data visualisations.
trans-unit.target: 所述 createAnalyser() 的方法 BaseAudioContext 接口创建一个 AnalyserNode ，其可用于以暴露音频时间和频率数据，并创建数据可视化。

trans-unit.source: The createAnswer() method on the RTCPeerConnection interface creates an SDP answer to an offer received from a remote peer during the offer/answer negotiation of a WebRTC connection. The answer contains information about any media already attached to the session, codecs and options supported by the browser, and any ICE candidates already gathered. The answer is delivered to the returned Promise, and should then be sent to the source of the offer to continue the negotiation process.
trans-unit.target: 所述 createAnswer() 的上方法 RTCPeerConnection 接口创建SDP回答一个的WebRTC连接的提供/应答协商期间从远程对等体接收的报价。答案包含有关会话中已附加的任何媒体，浏览器支持的编解码器和选项以及已收集的所有ICE候选者的信息。答案将传递到返回的 Promise ，然后应发送到要约的来源以继续协商过程。

trans-unit.source: The createAnswer() method on the RTCPeerConnection interface creates an SDP answer to an offer received from a remote peer during the offer/answer negotiation of a WebRTC connection. The answer contains information about any media already attached to the session, codecs and options supported by the browser, and any ICE candidates already gathered. The answer is delivered to the returned Promise, and should then be sent to the source of the offer to continue the negotiation process.
trans-unit.target: 所述 createAnswer() 的上方法 RTCPeerConnection 接口创建SDP回答一个的WebRTC连接的提供/应答协商期间从远程对等体接收的报价。答案包含有关会话中已附加的任何媒体，浏览器支持的编解码器和选项以及已收集的所有ICE候选者的信息。答案将传递到返回的 Promise ，然后应发送到要约的来源以继续协商过程。

trans-unit.source: The createBiquadFilter() method of the BaseAudioContext interface creates a BiquadFilterNode, which represents a second order filter configurable as several different common filter types.
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 createBiquadFilter() 方法创建一个 BiquadFilterNode ，该BiquadFilterNode表示可配置为几种不同的常用过滤器类型的二阶过滤器。

trans-unit.source: The createBuffer() method of the BaseAudioContext Interface is used to create a new, empty AudioBuffer object, which can then be populated by data, and played via an AudioBufferSourceNode
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 createBuffer() 方法用于创建一个新的空 AudioBuffer 对象，然后可以用数据填充该对象，并通过 AudioBufferSourceNode 播放

trans-unit.source: The createBufferSource() method of the BaseAudioContext Interface is used to create a new AudioBufferSourceNode, which can be used to play audio data contained within an AudioBuffer object. AudioBuffers are created using BaseAudioContext.createBuffer or returned by BaseAudioContext.decodeAudioData when it successfully decodes an audio track.
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 createBufferSource() 方法用于创建一个新的 AudioBufferSourceNode ，可用来播放 AudioBuffer 对象中包含的音频数据。 AudioBuffer 使用 BaseAudioContext.createBuffer 创建，或者在成功解码 BaseAudioContext.decodeAudioData 时由BaseAudioContext.decodeAudioData返回。

trans-unit.source: The createChannelMerger() method of the BaseAudioContext interface creates a ChannelMergerNode, which combines channels from multiple audio streams into a single audio stream.
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 createChannelMerger() 方法创建一个 ChannelMergerNode ，它将多个音频流中的通道合并为一个音频流。

trans-unit.source: The createChannelSplitter() method of the BaseAudioContext Interface is used to create a ChannelSplitterNode, which is used to access the individual channels of an audio stream and process them separately.
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 createChannelSplitter() 方法用于创建 ChannelSplitterNode ，该ChannelSplitterNode用于访问音频流的各个通道并分别处理它们。

trans-unit.source: The createConstantSource() property of the BaseAudioContext interface creates a ConstantSourceNode object, which is an audio source that continuously outputs a monaural (one-channel) sound signal whose samples all have the same value.
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 createConstantSource() 属性创建一个 ConstantSourceNode 对象，该对象是一个音频源，它连续输出其样本都具有相同值的单声道（单声道）声音信号。

trans-unit.source: The createConvolver() method of the BaseAudioContext interface creates a ConvolverNode, which is commonly used to apply reverb effects to your audio. See the spec definition of Convolution for more information.
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 createConvolver() 方法创建一个 ConvolverNode ，通常用于将混响效果应用于音频。有关更多信息，请参见卷积的规范定义。

trans-unit.source: The createDataChannel() method on the RTCPeerConnection interface creates a new channel over which any kind of data may be transmitted. This can be useful for back-channel content such as images, file transfer, text chat, game update packets, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 所述 createDataChannel() 的上方法 RTCPeerConnection 接口创建在其上任何类型的数据可被发送的新信道。这对于反向通道内容（例如图像，文件传输，文本聊天，游戏更新包等）很有用。

trans-unit.source: The createDataChannel() method on the RTCPeerConnection interface creates a new channel over which any kind of data may be transmitted. This can be useful for back-channel content such as images, file transfer, text chat, game update packets, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 所述 createDataChannel() 的上方法 RTCPeerConnection 接口创建在其上任何类型的数据可被发送的新信道。这对于反向通道内容（例如图像，文件传输，文本聊天，游戏更新包等）很有用。

trans-unit.source: The createDelay() method of the BaseAudioContext Interface is used to create a DelayNode, which is used to delay the incoming audio signal by a certain amount of time.
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 createDelay() 方法用于创建 DelayNode ，该DelayNode用于将传入的音频信号延迟一定的时间。

trans-unit.source: The createDynamicsCompressor() method of the BaseAudioContext Interface is used to create a DynamicsCompressorNode, which can be used to apply compression to an audio signal.
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 createDynamicsCompressor() 方法用于创建 DynamicsCompressorNode ，该节点可用于对音频信号进行压缩。

trans-unit.source: The createGain() method of the BaseAudioContext interface creates a GainNode, which can be used to control the overall gain (or volume) of the audio graph.
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 createGain() 方法创建一个 GainNode ，该GainNode可用于控制音频图的总体增益（或音量）。

trans-unit.source: The createIIRFilter() method of the BaseAudioContext interface creates an IIRFilterNode, which represents a general infinite impulse response (IIR) filter which can be configured to serve as various types of filter.
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 createIIRFilter() 方法创建一个 IIRFilterNode ，该IIRFilterNode表示一个通用的无限冲激响应（IIR）过滤器，可以将其配置为用作各种类型的过滤器。

trans-unit.source: The createIndex() method of the IDBObjectStore interface creates and returns a new IDBIndex object in the connected database, this is, it creates a new field/column defining a new data point for each database record to contain.
trans-unit.target: IDBObjectStore 接口的 createIndex() 方法在连接的数据库中创建并返回一个新的 IDBIndex 对象，即，它创建一个新的字段/列，为要包含的每个数据库记录定义一个新的数据点。

trans-unit.source: The createKey() function is called once for each key that we want to present in the virtual keyboard. It creates the elements that comprise the key and its label, adds some data attributes to the element for later use, and assigns event handlers for the events we care about.
trans-unit.target: 该 createKey() 函数被调用一次为每个关键，我们要存在于虚拟键盘。它创建包含键及其标签的元素，向该元素添加一些数据属性以供以后使用，并为我们关注的事件分配事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The createLinearGradient() method is specified by four parameters defining the start and end points of the gradient line.
trans-unit.target: 所述 createLinearGradient() 是由四个参数定义渐变线的起点和终点指定的方法。

trans-unit.source: The createMediaElementSource() method of the AudioContext Interface is used to create a new MediaElementAudioSourceNode object, given an existing HTML <audio> or <video> element, the audio from which can then be played and manipulated.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的HTML <audio> 或 <video> 元素，可以使用 AudioContext 接口的 createMediaElementSource() 方法创建一个新的 MediaElementAudioSourceNode 对象，然后可以播放和操作该音频。

trans-unit.source: The createMediaStreamDestination() method of the AudioContext Interface is used to create a MediaStreamTrackAudioSourceNode associated with a MediaStream representing an media stream track.
trans-unit.target: AudioContext 接口的 createMediaStreamDestination() 方法用于创建与表示媒体流轨道的 MediaStreamTrackAudioSourceNode 关联的 MediaStream TrackAudioSourceNode。

trans-unit.source: The createMediaStreamDestination() method of the AudioContext Interface is used to create a new MediaStreamAudioDestinationNode object associated with a WebRTCMediaStream representing an audio stream, which may be stored in a local file or sent to another computer.
trans-unit.target: AudioContext 接口的 createMediaStreamDestination() 方法用于创建与代表音频流的WebRTC MediaStream 关联的新 MediaStreamAudioDestinationNode 对象，该对象可以存储在本地文件中，也可以发送到另一台计算机。

trans-unit.source: The createNoteTable() function builds the array noteFreq to contain an array of objects representing each octave. Each octave, in turn, has one named property for each note in that octave; the property's name is the note's name (such as "C#" to represent C-sharp), and the value is the frequency, in Hertz, of that note.
trans-unit.target: 所述 createNoteTable() 函数构建阵列 noteFreq 包含表示每个八度的对象的阵列。每个八度，每个八度中的每个音符都有一个命名属性。该属性的名称是该音符的名称（例如“ C＃”代表C尖角），该值是该音符的频率（以赫兹为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The createObjectStore() method of the IDBDatabase interface creates and returns a new object store or index.
trans-unit.target: IDBDatabase 接口的 createObjectStore() 方法创建并返回新的对象存储或索引。

trans-unit.source: The createObserver() method is called once page load is complete to handle actually creating the new IntersectionObserver and starting the process of observing the target element.
trans-unit.target: 页面加载完成后，将 createObserver() 方法，以处理实际创建新的 IntersectionObserver 并开始观察目标元素的过程。

trans-unit.source: The createOffer() method of the RTCPeerConnection interface initiates the creation of an SDP offer for the purpose of starting a new WebRTC connection to a remote peer. The SDP offer includes information about any MediaStreamTracks already attached to the WebRTC session, codec, and options supported by the browser, and any candidates already gathered by the ICE agent, for the purpose of being sent over the signaling channel to a potential peer to request a connection or to update the configuration of an existing connection.
trans-unit.target: RTCPeerConnection 接口的 createOffer() 方法启动SDP产品的创建，以启动与远程对等方的新WebRTC连接。 SDP产品包括有关已附加到WebRTC会话的任何 MediaStreamTrack ，浏览器支持的编解码器和选项以及ICE代理已经收集的任何候选者的信息，目的是通过信令通道发送给潜在的对等方。请求连接或更新现有连接的配置。

trans-unit.source: The createOffer() method of the RTCPeerConnection interface initiates the creation of an SDP offer for the purpose of starting a new WebRTC connection to a remote peer.
trans-unit.target: RTCPeerConnection 接口的 createOffer() 方法启动SDP产品的创建，以启动与远程对等方的新WebRTC连接。

trans-unit.source: The createOscillator() method of the BaseAudioContext interface creates an OscillatorNode, a source representing a periodic waveform. It basically generates a constant tone.
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 createOscillator() 方法创建一个 OscillatorNode ，它是表示周期性波形的源。它基本上会产生恒定的音调。

trans-unit.source: The createPanner() method of the BaseAudioContext Interface is used to create a new PannerNode, which is used to spatialize an incoming audio stream in 3D space.
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 createPanner() 方法用于创建新的 PannerNode ，该PannerNode用于在3D空间中空间化传入的音频流。

trans-unit.source: The createPeerConnection() function is used by both the caller and the callee to construct their RTCPeerConnection objects, their respective ends of the WebRTC connection. It's invoked by invite() when the caller tries to start a call, and by handleVideoOfferMsg() when the callee receives an offer message from the caller.
trans-unit.target: 所述 createPeerConnection() 函数是用来通过主叫用户和被叫双方来构造其 RTCPeerConnection 对象，它们各自的的WebRTC连接的端部。当呼叫者尝试开始呼叫时，由 invite() 调用，而当被呼叫者从呼叫者收到要约消息时，由 handleVideoOfferMsg() 调用。

trans-unit.source: The createPeriodicWave() method of the BaseAudioContext Interface is used to create a PeriodicWave, which is used to define a periodic waveform that can be used to shape the output of an OscillatorNode.
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 createPeriodicWave() 方法用于创建 PeriodicWave ，PeriodicWave用于定义可用于定型 OscillatorNode 输出的周期性波形。

trans-unit.source: The createRadialGradient() method is specified by six parameters, three defining the gradient's start circle, and three defining the end circle.
trans-unit.target: 所述 createRadialGradient() 是由六个参数，三定义渐变的开始圈和三个限定末端圆指定的方法。

trans-unit.source: The createScriptProcessor() method of the BaseAudioContext interface creates a ScriptProcessorNode used for direct audio processing.
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 createScriptProcessor() 方法创建用于直接音频处理的 ScriptProcessorNode 。

trans-unit.source: The createStereoPanner() method of the BaseAudioContext interface creates a StereoPannerNode, which can be used to apply stereo panning to an audio source. It positions an incoming audio stream in a stereo image using a low-cost equal-power panning algorithm.
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 createStereoPanner() 方法创建一个 StereoPannerNode ，可用于将立体声声像应用于音频源。它使用低成本的等功率声像算法将输入的音频流定位在立体声图像中。

trans-unit.source: The createWaveShaper() method of the BaseAudioContext interface creates a WaveShaperNode, which represents a non-linear distortion. It is used to apply distortion effects to your audio.
trans-unit.target: 所述 createWaveShaper() 的方法 BaseAudioContext 接口创建一个 WaveShaperNode ，它代表了非线性失真。用于将失真效果应用于音频。

trans-unit.source: The credentials property of the Navigator interface returns the CredentialsContainer interface, which exposes methods to request-credentials. The CredentialsContainer interface also notifies the user agent when an interesting event occurs, such as a successful sign-in or sign-out. This interface can be used for feature detection.
trans-unit.target: Navigator 接口的 credentials 属性返回 CredentialsContainer 接口，该接口将方法公开给请求凭证。所述 CredentialsContainer 当一个有趣的事件发生时，如成功登入或登出接口还通知用户代理。该接口可用于特征检测。

trans-unit.source: The credentials read-only property of the Request interface indicates whether the user agent should send cookies from the other domain in the case of cross-origin requests. This is similar to XHR’s withCredentials flag, but with three available values (instead of two):
trans-unit.target: Request 接口的 credentials 只读属性指示在跨域请求的情况下，用户代理是否应从其他域发送cookie。这类似于XHR的 withCredentials 标志，但是具有三个可用值（而不是两个）：

trans-unit.source: The csp property of the HTMLIFrameElement interface specifies the Content Security Policy that an embedded document must agree to enforce upon itself.
trans-unit.target: HTMLIFrameElement 接口的 csp 属性指定嵌入式文档必须同意对其执行的内容安全策略。

trans-unit.source: The currentTime read-only property of the BaseAudioContext interface returns a double representing an ever-increasing hardware timestamp in seconds that can be used for scheduling audio playback, visualizing timelines, etc. It starts at 0.
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 currentTime 只读属性返回一个double值，该值表示以秒为单位的不断增加的硬件时间戳，可用于安排音频播放，可视化时间轴等。它从0开始。

trans-unit.source: The currentTime read-only property of the Web Animations API's AnimationTimeline interface returns the timeline's current time in milliseconds, or null if the timeline is inactive.
trans-unit.target: Web Animations API的 AnimationTimeline 接口的 currentTime 只读属性返回时间轴的当前时间（以毫秒为单位）；如果时间轴处于非活动状态，则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: The currentTime read-only property of the AnimationPlaybackEvent interface represents the current time of the animation that generated the event at the moment the event is queued. This will be unresolved if the animation was idle at the time the event was generated.
trans-unit.target: AnimationPlaybackEvent 接口的 currentTime 只读属性表示在事件排队时生成事件的动画的当前时间。如果动画在生成事件时 idle ，则将无法解决。

trans-unit.source: The curve property of the WaveShaperNode interface is a Float32Array of numbers describing the distortion to apply.
trans-unit.target: 该 curve 的财产 WaveShaperNode 接口是 Float32Array 描述应用失真数字。

trans-unit.source: The customElements read-only property of the Window interface returns a reference to the CustomElementRegistry object, which can be used to register new custom elements and get information about previously registered custom elements.
trans-unit.target: Window 接口的 customElements 只读属性返回对 CustomElementRegistry 对象的引用，该对象可用于注册新的自定义元素并获取有关先前已注册的自定义元素的信息。

trans-unit.source: The data argument may be an array or an object.
trans-unit.target: 的 data 参数可以是阵列或一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The data parameter is an ArrayBufferView, Blob, DOMString, or FormData object containing the data to be transmitted.
trans-unit.target: 该 data 参数是 ArrayBufferView ， Blob ， DOMString ，或 FormData 要发送包含数据对象。

trans-unit.source: The data property returns a Uint8ClampedArray which can be accessed to look at the raw pixel data; each pixel is represented by four one-byte values (red, green, blue, and alpha, in that order; that is, "RGBA" format). Each color component is represented by an integer between 0 and 255. Each component is assigned a consecutive index within the array, with the top left pixel's red component being at index 0 within the array. Pixels then proceed from left to right, then downward, throughout the array.
trans-unit.target: 的 data 属性返回 Uint8ClampedArray 其可被访问以看看原始像素数据; 每个像素由四个1字节的值表示（红色，绿色，蓝色和alpha，按此顺序；即“ RGBA”格式）。每个颜色分量由0到255之间的整数表示。每个分量都在数组中分配了一个连续的索引，左上像素的红色分量在数组中的索引0处。然后，像素在整个阵列中从左到右，然后向下。

trans-unit.source: The data read-only property of the ExtendableMessageEvent interface returns the event's data. It can be any data type.
trans-unit.target: ExtendableMessageEvent 接口的 data 只读属性返回事件的数据。它可以是任何数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The data read-only property of the InputEvent interface returns a DOMString with the inserted characters. This may be an empty string if the change doesn't insert text (such as when deleting characters, for example).
trans-unit.target: InputEvent 接口的 data 只读属性返回带有插入字符的 DOMString 。如果更改未插入文本（例如，删除字符时），则该字符串可能为空。

trans-unit.source: The data read-only property of the MessageEvent interface represents the data sent by the message emitter.
trans-unit.target: MessageEvent 接口的 data 只读属性表示消息发射器发送的数据。

trans-unit.source: The data read-only property of the Notification interface returns a structured clone of the notification's data, as specified in the data option of the Notification() constructor.
trans-unit.target: Notification 接口的 data 只读属性返回Notification数据的结构化克隆，如 Notification() 构造函数的 data 选项所指定。

trans-unit.source: The data read-only property of the PushEvent interface returns a reference to a PushMessageData object containing data sent to the PushSubscription.
trans-unit.target: PushEvent 接口的 data 只读属性返回对包含发送到 PushSubscription 的数据的 PushMessageData 对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: The dataTransfer read-only property of the InputEvent interface returns a DataTransfer object containing information about richtext or plaintext data being added to or removed from editible content.
trans-unit.target: InputEvent 接口的 dataTransfer 只读属性返回一个 DataTransfer 对象，该对象包含有关要添加到可编辑内容中或从中删除的富文本或明文数据的信息。

trans-unit.source: The dataavailable event is fired when the MediaRecorder delivers media data to your application for its use. The data is provided in a Blob object that contains the data. This occurs in four situations:
trans-unit.target: 该 dataavailable 当MediaRecorder提供媒体数据到应用程序供其使用事件。数据在包含数据的 Blob 对象中提供。这在四种情况下发生：

trans-unit.source: The db read-only property of the IDBTransaction interface returns the database connection with which this transaction is associated.
trans-unit.target: IDBTransaction 接口的 db 只读属性返回与此事务关联的数据库连接。

trans-unit.source: The decodeAudioData() method of the BaseAudioContext Interface is used to asynchronously decode audio file data contained in an ArrayBuffer. In this case the ArrayBuffer is loaded from XMLHttpRequest and FileReader. The decoded AudioBuffer is resampled to the AudioContext's sampling rate, then passed to a callback or promise.
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 decodeAudioData() 方法用于异步解码 ArrayBuffer 中包含的音频文件数据。在这种情况下， ArrayBuffer 是从 XMLHttpRequest 和 FileReader 加载的。解码的AudioBuffer被重新采样为AudioContext的采样率，然后传递给回调或Promise。

trans-unit.source: The decodedBodySize read-only property returns the size (in octets) received from the fetch (HTTP or cache) of the message body, after removing any applied content-codings. If the resource is retrieved from an application cache or local resources, it returns the size of the payload after removing any applied content-codings.
trans-unit.target: 删除所有应用的内容编码后， decodedBodySize 只读属性返回从消息正文的提取（HTTP或缓存）接收的大小（八位字节）。如果从应用程序缓存或本地资源中检索资源，则在删除所有应用的内容编码后，它将返回有效负载的大小。

trans-unit.source: The decoding property of the HTMLImageElement interface represents a hint given to the browser on how it should decode the image.
trans-unit.target: HTMLImageElement 接口的 decoding 属性表示向浏览器提供的有关如何解码图像的提示。

trans-unit.source: The decodingInfo() and encodingInfo() methods both return promises. Once the promises state is fulfilled, you can access the MediaCapabilitiesInfo interface's supported, smooth, and powerEfficient properties.
trans-unit.target: 该 decodingInfo() 和 encodingInfo() 方法均返回承诺。一旦状态承诺满足，你可以访问 MediaCapabilitiesInfo Interface公司的 supported ， smooth 和 powerEfficient 性能。

trans-unit.source: The default read-only property of the SpeechSynthesisVoice interface returns a Boolean indicating whether the voice is the default voice for the current app (true), or not (false.)
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesisVoice 接口的 default 只读属性返回一个 Boolean 指示语音是当前应用程序的默认语音（ true ）还是不是（ false )。

trans-unit.source: The defaultSelected property is no longer read-only.
trans-unit.target: 该 defaultSelected 财产不再是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The defaultValue read-only property of the AudioParam interface represents the initial value of the attributes as defined by the specific AudioNode creating the AudioParam.
trans-unit.target: AudioParam 接口的 defaultValue 只读属性表示属性的初始值，该属性的初始值由创建 AudioParam 的特定 AudioNode 定义。

trans-unit.source: The defer attribute may be specified with the async attribute, so legacy browsers that only support defer (and not async) fall back to the defer behavior instead of the default blocking behavior.
trans-unit.target: 该 defer 属性可以与指定 async 属性，因此传统的浏览器只支持 defer （而不是 async ）回落到 defer 行为，而不是默认的阻止行为。

trans-unit.source: The delayTime property of the DelayNode interface is an a-rateAudioParam representing the amount of delay to apply.
trans-unit.target: DelayNode 接口的 delayTime 属性是一个a-rate AudioParam ,代表要应用的延迟量。

trans-unit.source: The delete() method of the Cache interface finds the Cache entry whose key is the request, and if found, deletes the Cache entry and returns a Promise that resolves to true. If no Cache entry is found, it resolves to false.
trans-unit.target: Cache 接口的 delete() 方法找到其键为请求的 Cache 条目，如果找到，则删除 Cache 条目并返回解析为 true 的 Promise 。如果未找到 Cache 条目，则解析为 false 。

trans-unit.source: The delete() method of the Headers interface deletes a header from the current Headers object.
trans-unit.target: Headers 接口的 delete() 方法从当前的 Headers 对象中删除一个标题。

trans-unit.source: The delete() method of the IDBCursor interface returns an IDBRequest object, and, in a separate thread, deletes the record at the cursor's position, without changing the cursor's position. Once the record is deleted, the cursor's value is set to null.
trans-unit.target: IDBCursor 接口的 delete() 方法返回一个 IDBRequest 对象，并在一个单独的线程中删除光标位置的记录，而不会更改光标的位置。删除记录后，游标的值将设置为null。

trans-unit.source: The delete() method of the IDBObjectStore interface returns an IDBRequest object, and, in a separate thread, deletes the specified record or records.
trans-unit.target: IDBObjectStore 接口的 delete() 方法返回一个 IDBRequest 对象，并在一个单独的线程中删除一个或多个指定记录。

trans-unit.source: The delete() method of the StylePropertyMap interface removes the CSS declaration with the given property.
trans-unit.target: StylePropertyMap 接口的 delete() 方法将删除具有给定属性的CSS声明。

trans-unit.source: The deleteDatabase() method of the IDBFactory interface requests the deletion of a database. The method returns an IDBOpenDBRequest object immediately, and performs the deletion operation asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: IDBFactory 接口的 deleteDatabase() 方法请求删除数据库。该方法立即返回 IDBOpenDBRequest 对象，并异步执行删除操作。

trans-unit.source: The deleteIndex() method of the IDBObjectStore interface destroys the index with the specified name in the connected database, used during a version upgrade.
trans-unit.target: IDBObjectStore 接口的 deleteIndex() 方法销毁连接数据库中具有指定名称的索引，该索引在版本升级期间使用。

trans-unit.source: The deleteObjectStore() method of the IDBDatabase interface destroys the object store with the given name in the connected database, along with any indexes that reference it.
trans-unit.target: IDBDatabase 接口的 deleteObjectStore() 方法将销毁连接数据库中具有给定名称的对象存储以及引用它的所有索引。

trans-unit.source: The description read-only property returns a DOMString value of the server-specified metric description, or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 的 description 只读属性返回一个 DOMString 服务器指定的度量描述的值或空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The desiredSize getter property of the ReadableByteStreamController interface returns the desired size required to fill the stream's internal queue.
trans-unit.target: 所述 desiredSize 所述的吸气剂属性 ReadableByteStreamController 接口返回所需大小要求填写流的内部队列中。

trans-unit.source: The desiredSize getter property of the ReadableStreamDefaultController interface returns the desired size required to fill the stream's internal queue.
trans-unit.target: 所述 desiredSize 所述的吸气剂属性 ReadableStreamDefaultController 接口返回所需大小要求填写流的内部队列中。

trans-unit.source: The desiredSize getter property of the WritableStreamDefaultWriter interface returns the desired size required to fill the stream's internal queue.
trans-unit.target: 所述 desiredSize 所述的吸气剂属性 WritableStreamDefaultWriter 接口返回所需大小要求填写流的内部队列中。

trans-unit.source: The destination is used by the user agent to, for example, help determine which set of rules to follow for CORS purposes, or how to navigate any complicated code paths that affect how specific types of request get handled.
trans-unit.target: 该 destination 由用户代理用来例如帮助确定出于CORS目的要遵循的规则集，或者如何导航影响影响如何处理特定请求类型的任何复杂代码路径。

trans-unit.source: The destination property of the BaseAudioContext interface returns an AudioDestinationNode representing the final destination of all audio in the context. It often represents an actual audio-rendering device such as your device's speakers.
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 destination 属性返回一个 AudioDestinationNode ,它表示上下文中所有音频的最终目标。它通常代表实际的音频渲染设备，例如设备的扬声器。

trans-unit.source: The destination read-only property of the Request interface returns a string describing the type of content being requested. The string must be one of those found in the RequestDestination enumerated type or the empty string, which is the default value.
trans-unit.target: Request 接口的 destination 只读属性返回一个字符串，该字符串描述了所请求内容的类型。该字符串必须是在 RequestDestination 枚举类型中找到的字符串之一或空字符串（这是默认值）。

trans-unit.source: The details read-only property of the PaymentResponse interface returns a JSON-serializable object that provides a payment method specific message used by the merchant to process the transaction and determine a successful funds transfer.
trans-unit.target: 的 details 只读的属性 PaymentResponse 接口返回，其提供用来由商家来处理事务，并确定一个成功的资金转帐的支付方法的特定消息的JSON序列化的对象。

trans-unit.source: The detune property of the AudioBufferSourceNode interface is a k-rateAudioParam representing detuning of oscillation in cents.
trans-unit.target: 的 detune 的财产 AudioBufferSourceNode 接口是K-速率 AudioParam 表示振荡的失谐美分。

trans-unit.source: The detune property of the BiquadFilterNode interface is an a-rateAudioParam representing detuning of the frequency in cents.
trans-unit.target: 的 detune 的财产 BiquadFilterNode 接口是一个速率 AudioParam 表示所述频率的失谐美分。

trans-unit.source: The detune property of the OscillatorNode interface is an a-rateAudioParam representing detuning of oscillation in cents.
trans-unit.target: 的 detune 的财产 OscillatorNode 接口是一个速率 AudioParam 表示振荡的失谐美分。

trans-unit.source: The deviceClass read only property of the USBDevice interface one of three properties that identify USB devices for the purpose of loading a USB driver that will work with that device. The other two properties are USBDevice.deviceSubclass and USBDevice.deviceprotocol.
trans-unit.target: USBDevice 接口的 deviceClass 只读属性是标识USB设备的三个属性之一，目的是加载将与该设备一起使用的USB驱动程序。其他两个属性是 USBDevice.deviceSubclass 和 USBDevice.deviceprotocol 。

trans-unit.source: The deviceClass read only property of the USBDevice interface one of three properties that identify USB devices for the purpose of loading a USB driver that will work with that device. The other two properties are USBDevice.deviceSubclass and USBDevice.deviceprotocol.
trans-unit.target: USBDevice 接口的 deviceClass 只读属性是标识USB设备的三个属性之一，目的是加载将与该设备一起使用的USB驱动程序。其他两个属性是USBDevice.deviceSubclass和USBDevice.deviceprotocol。

trans-unit.source: The deviceId readonly property of the MediaDeviceInfo interface returns a DOMString that is an identifier for the represented device and is persisted across sessions. It is un-guessable by other applications, and unique to the origin of the calling application. It is reset when the user clears cookies. For private browsing, a different identifier is used that is not persisted across sessions.
trans-unit.target: MediaDeviceInfo 接口的 deviceId 只读属性返回 DOMString ，该DOMString是表示的设备的标识符，并且在会话之间保持不变。它不能被其他应用程序猜测，并且对于调用应用程序的来源是唯一的。用户清除cookie时将重置此设置。对于私密浏览，使用了在会话之间不持久的其他标识符。

trans-unit.source: The deviceMemory read-only property of the navigator interface returns the amount of device memory in gigabytes. This value is an approximation given by rounding to the nearest power of 2 and dividing that number by 1024.
trans-unit.target: navigator 界面的 deviceMemory 只读属性返回以GB为单位的设备内存量。该值是一个近似值，其舍入为最接近的2的幂，然后将该数字除以1024。

trans-unit.source: The deviceProtocol read only property of the USBDevice interface one of three properties that identify USB devices for the purpose of loading a USB driver that will work with that device. The other two properties are USBDevice.deviceClass and USBDevice.deviceSubclass.
trans-unit.target: USBDevice 接口的 deviceProtocol 只读属性是标识USB设备的三个属性之一，目的是加载将与该设备一起使用的USB驱动程序。其他两个属性是 USBDevice.deviceClass 和 USBDevice.deviceSubclass 。

trans-unit.source: The deviceSubclass read only property of the USBDevice interface one of three properties that identify USB devices for the purpose of loading a USB driver that will work with that device. The other two properties are USBDevice.deviceClass and USBDevice.deviceProtocol.
trans-unit.target: USBDevice 接口的 deviceSubclass 只读属性是标识USB设备的三个属性之一，目的是加载将与该设备一起使用的USB驱动程序。其他两个属性是USBDevice.deviceClass和USBDevice.deviceProtocol。

trans-unit.source: The deviceVersionMajor read only property of the USBDevice interface he major version number of the device in a semantic versioning scheme.
trans-unit.target: USBDevice 接口的 deviceVersionMajor 只读属性，是语义版本控制方案中设备的主要版本号。

trans-unit.source: The deviceVersionMinor read only property of the USBDevice interface the minor version number of the device in a semantic versioning scheme.
trans-unit.target: 该 deviceVersionMinor 读的唯一属性 USBDevice 接口的设备的次要版本号在语义版本控制方案。

trans-unit.source: The deviceVersionSubminor read only property of the USBDevice interface the patch version number of the device in a semantic versioning scheme.
trans-unit.target: 该 deviceVersionSubminor 读的唯一属性 USBDevice 接口的设备的补丁版本号在语义版本控制方案。

trans-unit.source: The dialog feature removes all icons (restore, minimize, maximize) from the window's titlebar, leaving only the close button. Mozilla 1.2+ and Netscape 7.1 will render the other menu system commands (in FF 1.0 and in NS 7.0x, the command system menu is not identified with the Firefox/NS 7.0x icon on the left end of the titlebar: that's probably a bug. You can access the command system menu with a right-click on the titlebar). Dialog windows are windows which have no minimize system command icon and no maximize/restore down system command icon on the titlebar nor in correspondent menu item in the command system menu. They are said to be dialog because their normal, usual purpose is to only notify info and to be dismissed, closed. On Mac systems, dialog windows have a different window border and they may get turned into a sheet.
trans-unit.target: 该 dialog 此功能从窗口的标题栏中删除所有图标（还原，最小化，最大化），仅保留关闭按钮。 Mozilla 1.2+和Netscape 7.1将呈现其他菜单系统命令（在FF 1.0和NS 7.0x中，命令系统菜单未使用标题栏左端的Firefox / NS 7.0x图标标识：这可能是一个错误。您可以右键单击标题栏访问命令系统菜单。对话框窗口是在标题栏上或命令系统菜单的相应菜单项中都没有最小化系统命令图标，也没有最大化/还原系统命令图标的窗口。之所以称它们为对话是因为它们通常的通常目的是仅通知信息并被解雇，关闭。在Mac系统上，对话框窗口具有不同的窗口边框，它们可能会变成一张纸。

trans-unit.source: The dir read-only property of the Notification interface indicates the text direction of the notification, as specified in the dir option of the Notification() constructor.
trans-unit.target: Notification 接口的 dir 只读属性指示通知的文本方向，如 Notification() 构造函数的 dir 选项所指定。

trans-unit.source: The direction property of the Web Animations API dictionary EffectTiming indicates an animation's playback direction along its timeline, as well as its behavior when it reaches the end of an interation
trans-unit.target: Web动画API词典的 EffectTiming 的 direction 属性指示动画沿其时间轴的播放方向，以及到达交互结束时的行为

trans-unit.source: The direction read-only property of the IDBCursor interface is a DOMString that returns the direction of traversal of the cursor (set using IDBObjectStore.openCursor for example). See the Values section below for possible values.
trans-unit.target: IDBCursor 接口的 direction 只读属性是 DOMString ，它返回游标的遍历方向（例如，使用 IDBObjectStore.openCursor 设置）。有关可能的值，请参见下面的“ 值”部分。

trans-unit.source: The disconnect() method of the AudioNode interface lets you disconnect one or more nodes from the node on which the method is called.
trans-unit.target: AudioNode 接口的 disconnect() 方法可让您从调用该方法的节点上断开一个或多个节点。

trans-unit.source: The disconnect() method of the PerformanceObserver interface is used to stop the performance observer from receiving any performance entry events.
trans-unit.target: PerformanceObserver 接口的 disconnect() 方法用于阻止性能观察器接收任何性能输入事件。

trans-unit.source: The dispatchEvent method throws UNSPECIFIED_EVENT_TYPE_ERR if the event's type was not specified by initializing the event before the method was called, or if the event's type is null or an empty string. Exceptions thrown by event handlers are reported as uncaught exceptions; the event handlers run on a nested callstack: they block the caller until they complete, but exceptions do not propagate to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 该 dispatchEvent 方法抛出 UNSPECIFIED_EVENT_TYPE_ERR 如果不通过初始化该事件被调用的方法之前指定事件的类型中，如果事件的类型为 null 或空字符串。事件处理程序抛出的异常报告为未捕获的异常；事件处理程序在嵌套的调用堆栈上运行：它们阻止调用者，直到它们完成，但是异常不会传播到调用者。

trans-unit.source: The display property of the FontFace interface determines how a font face is displayed based on whether and when it is downloaded and ready to use. This property is equivalent to the CSS font-display descriptor.
trans-unit.target: FontFace 界面的 display 属性确定是否显示字体以及如何下载字体以及何时可以使用字体。此属性等效于CSS font-display 描述符。

trans-unit.source: The display read-only property of the VRDisplayEvent interface returns the VRDisplay associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: VRDisplayEvent 接口的 display 只读属性返回与此事件关联的 VRDisplay 。

trans-unit.source: The displayId read-only property of the VRDisplay interface returns an identifier for this particular VRDisplay, which is also used as an association point in the Gamepad API (see Gamepad.displayId).
trans-unit.target: VRDisplay 接口的 displayId 只读属性返回此特定 VRDisplay 的标识符，该标识符也用作Gamepad API中的关联点（请参阅 Gamepad.displayId ）。

trans-unit.source: The displayName read-only property of the VRDisplay interface returns a human-readable name to identify the VRDisplay.
trans-unit.target: VRDisplay 接口的 displayName 只读属性返回人类可读的名称，以标识 VRDisplay 。

trans-unit.source: The displayWarning() function presents a notification of a problem. It's not an elegant function but does the job for the purposes of this example:
trans-unit.target: 该 displayWarning() 函数提出了一个问题的通知。这不是一个优雅的功能，但出于以下示例的目的而起作用：

trans-unit.source: The distanceModel property of the PannerNode interface is an enumerated value determining which algorithm to use to reduce the volume of the audio source as it moves away from the listener.
trans-unit.target: PannerNode 接口的 distanceModel 属性是一个枚举值，该值确定当音频源远离侦听器时使用哪种算法来减小音频源的音量。

trans-unit.source: The doLoad() method is called when the XHTML document initially loads. This method's job is to prepare the variables needed by the chroma-key processing code, and to set up an event listener so we can detect when the user starts playing the video.
trans-unit.target: 所述 doLoad() 方法被调用时最初的XHTML文档的负载。该方法的工作是准备色键处理代码所需的变量，并设置事件侦听器，以便我们可以检测到用户何时开始播放视频。

trans-unit.source: The do_write() function use the same lock but in 'exclusive' mode which will delay invocation of the request() call in do_read() until the write operation has completed. This applies even across event handlers, tabs, or workers.
trans-unit.target: 所述 do_write() 函数中使用相同的锁，但在 'exclusive' 模式，其将延迟的调用 request() 在调用 do_read() ，直到写操作已完成。这甚至适用于事件处理程序，选项卡或工作程序。

trans-unit.source: The document.close() method finishes writing to a document, opened with document.open().
trans-unit.target: 所述 document.close() 方法完成写入到一个文件中，用开 document.open() 。

trans-unit.source: The document.title property gets or sets the current title of the document.
trans-unit.target: 该 document.title 时属性获取或设置当前标题的文件。

trans-unit.source: The document object itself has 2 children: the Doctype declaration and the root element, typically referred to as documentElement. (In (X)HTML documents this is the HTML element.)
trans-unit.target: 的 document 对象本身有2个孩子：DOCTYPE声明和根元素，典型地被称为 documentElement 。（在（X）HTML文档中，这是 HTML 元素。）

trans-unit.source: The document object returned by this property is the main object with which all the child nodes in the actual HTML document are created. If this property is used on a node that is itself a document, the result is null.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的 document 对象是用于创建实际HTML文档中所有子节点的主要对象。如果在本身是文档的节点上使用此属性，则结果为 null 。

trans-unit.source: The dodrop event hander is called when dropping an item. It checks the mozItemCount property to check how many items have been dropped and iterates over them. For each item, the mozTypesAt() method is called to get the list of types. This list is iterated over to get all of the data associated with the drag.
trans-unit.target: 该 dodrop 丢弃的物品时，事件处理程序被调用。它检查 mozItemCount 属性以检查删除了多少个项目并对其进行迭代。对于每个项目， mozTypesAt() 调用mozTypesAt（）方法以获取类型列表。遍历此列表以获取与拖动关联的所有数据。

trans-unit.source: The dom.vr* prefs are enabled by default at this point, in Nightly/Aurora editions.
trans-unit.target: 该 dom.vr* 首选项默认情况下，在这一点上启用，在每晚/极光版本。

trans-unit.source: The domComplete read-only property returns a timestamp representing the time value equal to the time immediately before the user agent sets the current document readiness of the current document to complete.
trans-unit.target: 所述 domComplete 只读属性返回一个 timestamp 表示的时间值等于之前的用户代理将当前文档的当前文档准备的时间完成。

trans-unit.source: The domContentLoadedEventEnd read-only property returns a timestamp representing the time value equal to the time immediately after the current document's DOMContentLoaded event completes.
trans-unit.target: 该 domContentLoadedEventEnd 只读属性返回一个 timestamp 表示时间值等于时间当前文档的后立即DOMContentLoaded事件完成。

trans-unit.source: The domContentLoadedEventStart read-only property returns a timestamp representing the time value equal to the time immediately before the user agent fires the DOMContentLoaded event at the current document.
trans-unit.target: 所述 domContentLoadedEventStart 只读属性返回一个 timestamp 表示的时间值等于之前的用户代理的触发的时间DOMContentLoaded在当前文档的事件。

trans-unit.source: The domInteractive read-only property returns a timestamp representing the time value equal to the time immediately before the user agent sets the current document readiness of the current document to interactive.
trans-unit.target: 所述 domInteractive 只读属性返回一个 timestamp 表示的时间值等于之前的用户代理将当前文档的当前文档准备的时间互动。

trans-unit.source: The domain property of the Document interface gets/sets the domain portion of the origin of the current document, as used by the same origin policy.
trans-unit.target: Document 界面的 domain 属性获取/设置当前文档原点的域部分，由同一原点策略使用。

trans-unit.source: The domainLookupEnd read-only property returns the timestamp immediately after the browser finishes the domain name lookup for the resource.
trans-unit.target: 该 domainLookupEnd 只读属性返回 timestamp 立即浏览器完成域名查找的资源之后。

trans-unit.source: The domainLookupStart read-only property returns the timestamp immediately before the browser starts the domain name lookup for the resource.
trans-unit.target: 该 domainLookupStart 只读属性返回 timestamp 立即启动浏览器域名查找的资源之前。

trans-unit.source: The downDegrees read-only property of the VRFieldOfView interface returns the number of degrees downwards that the field of view extends in.
trans-unit.target: VRFieldOfView 接口的 downDegrees 只读属性返回视野向下延伸的度数。

trans-unit.source: The downlink read-only property of the NetworkInformation interface returns the effective bandwidth estimate in megabits per second, rounded to the nearest multiple of 25 kilobits per seconds. This value is based on recently observed application layer throughput across recently active connections, excluding connections made to a private address space. In the absence of recent bandwidth measurement data, the attribute value is determined by the properties of the underlying connection technology.
trans-unit.target: NetworkInformation 接口的 downlink 只读属性返回有效带宽估计值（以兆比特/秒为单位），四舍五入到最接近的25比特/秒的倍数。该值基于最近观察到的跨最近活动连接的应用程序层吞吐量，不包括与私有地址空间的连接。在没有最新带宽测量数据的情况下，属性值由基础连接技术的属性确定。

trans-unit.source: The dragover event handler for element targetElement.
trans-unit.target: 该 dragover 事件处理程序元素 targetElement 。

trans-unit.source: The drawDashedLine() function created below makes the drawing of multiple dashed lines simple. It receives a pattern array as its only parameter.
trans-unit.target: 下面创建的 drawDashedLine() 函数使绘制多条虚线变得简单。它接收一个模式数组作为其唯一参数。

trans-unit.source: The drawImage() method uses the source element's intrinsic size in CSS pixels when drawing.
trans-unit.target: 所述 drawImage() 方法使用源元件的固有大小在CSS像素绘图时。

trans-unit.source: The duration property of the AudioBuffer interface returns a double representing the duration, in seconds, of the PCM data stored in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: AudioBuffer 接口的 duration 属性返回一个双精度值，表示存储在缓冲区中的PCM数据的持续时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The duration property of the dictionary EffectTiming in the Web Animations API specifies the duration in milliseconds that a single iteration (from beginning to end) the animation should take to complete.
trans-unit.target: 该 duration 字典的财产 EffectTiming 中的Web动画API指定以毫秒为单位的持续时间单次迭代（从开始到结束）动画应该采取的完成。

trans-unit.source: The duration property returns a timestamp that is the duration of the performance entry.
trans-unit.target: 该 duration 属性返回一个 timestamp 那就是持续时间 performance entry 。

trans-unit.source: The duration read-only property returns a double that contains the server-specified metric duration, or value 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 的 duration 只读属性返回包含服务器指定的度量的持续时间，或值的双 0.0 。

trans-unit.source: The durationchange event is fired when the duration attribute has been updated.
trans-unit.target: 该 durationchange 当事件被触发 duration 属性被更新。

trans-unit.source: The dx and dy parameters indicate the device coordinates within the context at which to paint the top left corner of the pixel data you wish to draw.
trans-unit.target: 在 dx 和 dy 参数指示范围内的设备坐标处画的左上角，你想画的像素数据的角落。

trans-unit.source: The effectiveType read-only property of the NetworkInformation interface returns the effective type of the connection meaning one of 'slow-2g', '2g', '3g', or '4g'. This value is determined using a combination of recently observed, round-trip time and downlink values.
trans-unit.target: 所述 effectiveType 只读的属性 NetworkInformation 接口返回的有效类型的连接的意思是“慢-2G”中的一个的，“2g”上，“3G”，或“4G”。使用最近观察到的往返时间和下行链路值的组合来确定此值。

trans-unit.source: The elapsedTime read-only property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface returns the elapsed time in seconds after the SpeechSynthesisUtterance.text started being spoken that the event was triggered at.
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesisUtterance 接口的 elapsedTime 只读属性返回在开始触发该事件的口头 SpeechSynthesisUtterance.text 之后经过的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The element specified is not a valid element.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 element 不是有效的元素。

trans-unit.source: The elementFromPoint() method—available on both the Document and ShadowRoot objects—returns the topmost Element at the specified coordinates (relative to the viewport).
trans-unit.target: 在 Document 和 ShadowRoot 对象上都可用的 elementFromPoint() 方法返回指定坐标（相对于视口）处最顶层的 Element 。

trans-unit.source: The elementsFromPoint() property of the DocumentOrShadowRoot interface returns an array of all elements at the specified coordinates (relative to the viewport).
trans-unit.target: DocumentOrShadowRoot 接口的 elementsFromPoint() 属性返回指定坐标（相对于视口）处所有元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: The ellipse() method creates an elliptical arc centered at (x, y) with the radii radiusX and radiusY. The path starts at startAngle and ends at endAngle, and travels in the direction given by anticlockwise (defaulting to clockwise).
trans-unit.target: 的 ellipse() 方法创建一个椭圆弧的中心在 (x, y) 与半径 radiusX 和 radiusY 。路径从 startAngle 开始，在 endAngle 结束，并沿 anticlockwise （默认为顺时针）给出的方向行进。

trans-unit.source: The embeds read-only property of the Document interface returns a list of the embedded <object> elements within the current document.
trans-unit.target: Document 接口的 embeds 只读属性返回当前文档中嵌入的 <object> 元素的列表。

trans-unit.source: The emma read-only property of the SpeechRecognitionEvent interface returns an
trans-unit.target: SpeechRecognitionEvent 接口的 emma 只读属性返回一个

trans-unit.source: The emptied event is fired when the media has become empty; for example, this event is sent if the media has already been loaded (or partially loaded), and the load() method is called to reload it.
trans-unit.target: 在 emptied 时，媒体已经成为空事件被触发; 例如，如果已加载（或部分加载）媒体，则发送此事件，并调用 load() 方法重新加载它。

trans-unit.source: The enabled property is a Boolean whose value is true if the track is enabled; enabled tracks produce audio while the media is playing. Setting enabled to false effectively mutes the audio track, preventing it from contributing to the media's audio performance.
trans-unit.target: 该 enabled 属性是一个布尔值，其值是 true 当轨道启用; 媒体播放时，启用的曲目会产生音频。设置 enabled 以 false 有效静音音频轨道，防止它促进了媒体的音频性能。

trans-unit.source: The enabled property on the MediaStreamTrack interface is a Boolean value which is true if the track is allowed to render the source stream or false if it is not. This can be used to intentionally mute a track. When enabled, a track's data is output from the source to the destination; otherwise, empty frames are output.
trans-unit.target: 在 enabled 该物业 MediaStreamTrack 接口是一个布尔值，它是 true ，如果被允许在轨道呈现源流或 false ，如果它不是。这可用于故意使轨道静音。启用后，曲目的数据将从源输出到目的地；否则，将输出空白帧。

trans-unit.source: The encodedBodySize read-only property represents the size (in octets) received from the fetch (HTTP or cache), of the payload body, before removing any applied content-codings.
trans-unit.target: 所述 encodedBodySize 只读属性表示从取（HTTP或高速缓存）接收的大小（以字节为单位），则的有效载荷体，除去任何施加的内容编码之前。

trans-unit.source: The endContainer property of the StaticRange interface returns the end Node for the range.
trans-unit.target: StaticRange 接口的 endContainer 属性返回范围的结束 Node 。

trans-unit.source: The endDelay property of the EffectTiming dictionary (part of the Web Animations API) indicates the number of milliseconds to delay after the active period of an animation sequence. The animation's end time—the time at which an iteration is considered to have finished—is the time at which the animation finishes an iteration (its initial delay, AnimationEffectTimingReadOnly.delay, plus its duration,duration, plus its end delay.
trans-unit.target: EffectTiming 字典（Web Animations API的一部分）的 endDelay 属性指示在动画序列的有效期之后要延迟的毫秒数。动画的结束时间（即完成一次迭代的时间）是动画完成一次迭代的时间（其初始延迟， AnimationEffectTimingReadOnly.delay ，其持续时间， duration 及其结束延迟。

trans-unit.source: The endOffset property of the StaticRange interface returns the offset into the end node of the range's end position.
trans-unit.target: StaticRange 接口的 endOffset 属性将偏移量返回到范围终点位置的终点节点。

trans-unit.source: The ended event is fired when playback has stopped because the end of the media was reached.
trans-unit.target: 在 ended 时，播放停止，因为媒体的年底达到触发事件。

trans-unit.source: The ended read-only property of the MediaStream interface returns a Boolean value which is true if the stream has been completely read, or false if the end of the stream has not been reached. This value once the ended event has been fired.
trans-unit.target: MediaStream 接口的 ended 只读属性返回一个布尔值，如果已完全读取流，则为 true ;如果尚未到达流的末尾，则为 false 。一旦 ended 事件被触发，此值。

trans-unit.source: The enqueue() method of the ReadableByteStreamController interface enqueues a given chunk in the associated stream.
trans-unit.target: ReadableByteStreamController 接口的 enqueue() 方法将给定的块放入关联的流中。

trans-unit.source: The enqueue() method of the ReadableStreamDefaultController interface enqueues a given chunk in the associated stream.
trans-unit.target: ReadableStreamDefaultController 接口的 enqueue() 方法将给定的块放入关联的流中。

trans-unit.source: The entries() read-only property of the MediaKeyStatusMap interface returns a new Iterator object, containing an array of [key, value] pairs for each element in the status map, in insertion order.
trans-unit.target: MediaKeyStatusMap 接口的 entries() 只读属性返回一个新的Iterator对象，该对象包含按插入顺序排列的状态图中每个元素的[key，value]对数组。

trans-unit.source: The entries read-only property of the KeyboardLayoutMap interface returns an array of a given object's own enumerable property [key, value] pairs, in the same order as that provided by a for...in loop (the difference being that a for-in loop enumerates properties in the prototype chain as well).
trans-unit.target: KeyboardLayoutMap 接口的 entries 只读属性返回给定对象自己的可枚举属性 [key, value] 对的数组，其顺序与 for...in 循环所提供的顺序相同（区别在于for-in in循环也会枚举原型链中的属性）。

trans-unit.source: The entryType property returns a DOMString representing the type of performance metric such as, for example, "mark". This property is read only.
trans-unit.target: 所述 entryType 属性返回 DOMString 表示的性能度量的类型，诸如，例如，“ mark ”。该属性是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The error() method of the ReadableByteStreamController interface causes any future interactions with the associated stream to error.
trans-unit.target: ReadableByteStreamController 接口的 error() 方法导致将来与关联流的任何交互均出错。

trans-unit.source: The error() method of the ReadableStreamBYOBRequest interface xxx
trans-unit.target: ReadableStreamBYOBRequest 接口xxx 的 error() 方法

trans-unit.source: The error() method of the ReadableStreamDefaultController interface causes any future interactions with the associated stream to error.
trans-unit.target: ReadableStreamDefaultController 接口的 error() 方法导致将来与关联流的任何交互均出错。

trans-unit.source: The error() method of the Response interface returns a new Response object associated with a network error.
trans-unit.target: Response 接口的 error() 方法返回与网络错误关联的新 Response 对象。

trans-unit.source: The error() method of the WritableStreamDefaultController interface causes any future interactions with the associated stream to error.
trans-unit.target: WritableStreamDefaultController 接口的 error() 方法导致将来与关联流的任何交互均出错。

trans-unit.source: The error property of the SpeechSynthesisErrorEvent interface returns an error code indicating what has gone wrong with a speech synthesis attempt.
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesisErrorEvent 接口的 error 属性返回错误代码，指示语音合成尝试出了什么问题。

trans-unit.source: The error property returns a DOMError object.
trans-unit.target: 该 error 属性返回一个 DOMError 对象。

trans-unit.source: The error read-only property of the IDBRequest interface returns the error in the event of an unsuccessful request.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求失败，则 IDBRequest 接口的 error 只读属性将返回错误。

trans-unit.source: The error read-only property of the SensorErrorEvent interface returns the DOMException object passed in the event's contructor.
trans-unit.target: SensorErrorEvent 接口的 error 只读属性返回在事件的构造函数中传递的 DOMException 对象。

trans-unit.source: The error read-only property of the SpeechRecognitionError interface returns the type of error raised.
trans-unit.target: SpeechRecognitionError 接口的 error 只读属性返回引发的错误的类型。

trans-unit.source: The errorCallback is called with an appropriate error code (if the callback was provided).
trans-unit.target: 所述 errorCallback 被称为与适当的错误代码（如果提供的回调）。

trans-unit.source: The errorCallback is called with an appropriate error, such as FileError.PATH_EXISTS_ERR.
trans-unit.target: 所述 errorCallback 被称为与一个适当的错误，如 FileError.PATH_EXISTS_ERR 。

trans-unit.source: The escape() method can also be used for escaping strings, although it escapes characters that don't strictly need to be escaped:
trans-unit.target: 尽管 escape() 方法可以对不需要严格转义的字符进行转义，但它也可以用于转义字符串：

trans-unit.source: The estimate() method of the StorageManager interface asks the Storage Manager to obtain quota and usage information for the current origin. This method operates asynchronously, so it returns a Promise which resolves once the information is available. The promise's fulfillment handler receives as an input a StorageEstimate with the usage and quota data.
trans-unit.target: StorageManager 界面的 estimate() 方法要求Storage Manager获取当前来源的配额和使用情况信息。此方法异步运行，因此它返回一个 Promise ，一旦信息可用，它就会解决。承诺的履行处理程序接收带有使用情况和配额数据的 StorageEstimate 作为输入。

trans-unit.source: The event.target property can be used in order to implement event delegation.
trans-unit.target: 该 event.target 属性可以为了实现使用事件代表团。

trans-unit.source: The exclusive property on the FileSystemFlags dictionary is used in tandem with the create property to determine whether or not it's acceptable to require that the file not already exist when the reference to it is created by calling FileSystemDirectoryEntry.getFile() or FileSystemDirectoryEntry.getDirectory().
trans-unit.target: 在 exclusive 的财产 FileSystemFlags 字典用于亦随创建属性，以确定它是否是可以接受的要求，该文件不存在时，通过调用创建它的参考 FileSystemDirectoryEntry.getFile() 或 FileSystemDirectoryEntry.getDirectory() 。

trans-unit.source: The exitPointerLock asynchronously releases a pointer lock previously requested through Element.requestPointerLock.
trans-unit.target: 该 exitPointerLock 异步释放先前通过请求指针锁定 Element.requestPointerLock 。

trans-unit.source: The expirationTime read-only property of the PushSubscription interface returns a DOMHighResTimeStamp of the subscription expiration time associated with the push subscription, if there is one, or null otherwise.
trans-unit.target: PushSubscription 接口的 expirationTime 只读属性返回与push订阅相关联的订阅到期时间的 DOMHighResTimeStamp （如果有的话），否则返回null。

trans-unit.source: The expiryMonth property of the BasicCardResponse dictionary contains the expiry month of the card used to make the payment.
trans-unit.target: BasicCardResponse 词典的 expiryMonth 属性包含用于付款的卡的到期月份。

trans-unit.source: The expiryYear property of the BasicCardResponse dictionary contains the expiry year of the card used to make the payment.
trans-unit.target: BasicCardResponse 词典的 expiryYear 属性包含用于付款的卡的到期年份。

trans-unit.source: The exponentialRampToValueAtTime() method of the AudioParam Interface schedules a gradual exponential change in the value of the AudioParam. The change starts at the time specified for the previous event, follows an exponential ramp to the new value given in the value parameter, and reaches the new value at the time given in the endTime parameter.
trans-unit.target: 所述 exponentialRampToValueAtTime() 的方法 AudioParam 接口时间表在的值逐渐指数变化 AudioParam 。更改从为上一个事件指定的时间开始，然后按照指数上升到 value 参数中给定的新值，并在 endTime 参数中给定的时间达到新值。

trans-unit.source: The fail, zfail and zpass parameters accept all constants listed below.
trans-unit.target: 的 fail ， zfail 和 zpass 参数接受下面列出的所有常量。

trans-unit.source: The fetch() method can optionally accept a second parameter, an init object that allows you to control a number of different settings:
trans-unit.target: 的 fetch() 方法可任选地接受第二个参数， init 对象，允许你控制许多不同的设置：

trans-unit.source: The fetch() method is controlled by the connect-src directive of Content Security Policy rather than the directive of the resources it's retrieving.
trans-unit.target: 该 fetch() 方法是通过控制 connect-src 的指令内容安全策略，而不是它的检索资源的指令。

trans-unit.source: The fetch() method takes one mandatory argument, the path to the resource you want to fetch. It returns a Promise that resolves to the Response to that request, whether it is successful or not. You can also optionally pass in an init options object as the second argument (see Request).
trans-unit.target: 该 fetch() 方法接受一个强制参数，路径要获取资源。它返回一个 Promise ，该请求将解析为对该请求的 Response ，无论请求是否成功。您还可以选择传入 init options对象作为第二个参数（请参见 Request ）。

trans-unit.source: The fetch() method used to fetch a resource.
trans-unit.target: 用于获取资源的 fetch() 方法。

trans-unit.source: The fetch specification differs from jQuery.ajax() in two main ways:
trans-unit.target: 该 fetch 从规格不同 jQuery.ajax() 在两个主要方面：

trans-unit.source: The fetchStart read-only property represents a timestamp immediately before the browser starts to fetch the resource.
trans-unit.target: 该 fetchStart 只读属性表示 timestamp 立即启动浏览器来获取资源之前。

trans-unit.source: The fftSize property of the AnalyserNode interface is an unsigned long value and represents the window size in samples that is used when performing a Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) to get frequency domain data.
trans-unit.target: 所述 fftSize 所述的属性 AnalyserNode 接口是一个无符号长值，并且表示在样品窗口尺寸执行时所使用的快速傅立叶变换（FFT）以获得频域数据。

trans-unit.source: The fieldOfView read-only property of the VREyeParameters interface returns a VRFieldOfView object
trans-unit.target: VREyeParameters 接口的 fieldOfView 只读属性返回一个 VRFieldOfView 对象

trans-unit.source: The fillLightMode read-only property of the PhotoCapabilities interface returns an array of available fill light options. Options may include auto, off, or flash.
trans-unit.target: PhotoCapabilities 接口的 fillLightMode 只读属性返回一组可用的补光灯选项。选项可能包括 auto ， off 或 flash 。

trans-unit.source: The fillRect() function draws a large black square 100 pixels on each side. The clearRect() function then erases a 60x60 pixel square from the center, and then strokeRect() is called to create a rectangular outline 50x50 pixels within the cleared square.
trans-unit.target: 的 fillRect() 函数绘制在每一侧上一个大的黑色正方形100个像素。然后， clearRect() 函数从中心擦除60x60像素的正方形，然后 strokeRect() 在清除的正方形内创建50x50像素的矩形轮廓。

trans-unit.source: The fillRect() method draws a filled rectangle whose starting point is at (x, y) and whose size is specified by width and height. The fill style is determined by the current fillStyle attribute.
trans-unit.target: 的 fillRect() 方法绘制填充的矩形，其出发点是在 (x, y) ，并且其大小是由指定的 width 和 height 。填充样式由当前的 fillStyle 属性确定。

trans-unit.source: The filter property accepts one or more of the following filter functions in a DOMString.
trans-unit.target: 该 filter 属性接受的在下面的过滤器功能的一个或更多 DOMString 。

trans-unit.source: The finish()method of the Web Animations API's Animation Interface sets the current playback time to the end of the animation corresponding to the current playback direction. That is, if the animation is playing forward, it sets the playback time to the length of the animation sequence, and if the animation is playing in reverse (having had its reverse() method called), it sets the playback time to 0.
trans-unit.target: Web Animations API的 Animation Interface 的 finish() 方法将当前播放时间设置为与当前播放方向相对应的动画结尾。也就是说，如果动画正在播放，则将播放时间设置为动画序列的长度，如果动画是反向播放（已调用了 reverse() 方法），则将播放时间设置为0。

trans-unit.source: The finish event occurs when the animation completes naturally, as well as when the Animation.finish() method is called to immediately cause the animation to finish up.
trans-unit.target: 的 finish 当动画自然完成，以及当发生事件 Animation.finish() 方法被调用来立即原因动画来完成。。

trans-unit.source: The firCount property of the RTCRtpStreamStats dictionary indicates the number of Full Intra Request (FIR) packets have been sent by the receiver to the sender. This is a measure of how often the stream falls behind and has to skip frames in order to catch up.
trans-unit.target: RTCRtpStreamStats 词典的 firCount 属性指示接收器已向发送者发送的完整帧内请求（FIR）数据包的数量。这是衡量流落后多久并必须跳过帧以追赶的频率的一种度量。

trans-unit.source: The focus() method of the WindowClient interface gives user input focus to the current client and returns a Promise that resolves to the existing WindowClient.
trans-unit.target: WindowClient 界面的 focus() 方法将用户输入焦点提供给当前客户端，并返回一个解析为现有 WindowClient 的 Promise 。

trans-unit.source: The focused read-only property of the WindowClient interface is a Boolean that indicates whether the current client has focus.
trans-unit.target: WindowClient 接口的 focused 只读属性是一个 Boolean ，指示当前客户端是否具有焦点。

trans-unit.source: The fontfaces read-only property of the FontFaceLoadEventInit interface returns an array of FontFace instances, each of which represents a single usable font.
trans-unit.target: 所述 fontfaces 只读的属性 FontFaceLoadEventInit 接口返回的数组 FontFace 实例中，每一个表示一个单一的可用字体。

trans-unit.source: The fonts property of the Document interface returns the FontFaceSet interface of the document.
trans-unit.target: Document 接口的 fonts 属性返回文档的 FontFaceSet 接口。

trans-unit.source: The for loop that begins on line 6 scans through the frame's pixels, pulling out the red, green, and blue values for each pixel, and compares the values against predetermined numbers that are used to detect the green screen that will be replaced with the still background image imported from foo.png.
trans-unit.target: 从第6行开始的 for 循环会扫描该帧的像素，并提取每个像素的红色，绿色和蓝色值，并将这些值与用于检测将被静态图像替换的绿色屏幕的预定数字进行比较。从 foo.png 导入的背景图片。

trans-unit.source: The forEach() method of the DOMTokenList interface calls the callback given in parameter once for each value pair in the list, in insertion order.
trans-unit.target: DOMTokenList 接口的 forEach() 方法按插入顺序为列表中的每个值对调用一次在参数中给定的回调。

trans-unit.source: The forEach() method of the KeyboardLayoutMap interface executes a provided function once for each element of the map.
trans-unit.target: KeyboardLayoutMap 接口的 forEach() 方法为地图的每个元素执行一次提供的函数。

trans-unit.source: The forEach() method of the NodeList interface calls the callback given in parameter once for each value pair in the list, in insertion order.
trans-unit.target: NodeList 接口的 forEach() 方法按插入顺序为列表中的每个值对调用一次在参数中给定的回调。

trans-unit.source: The forEach property of the MediaKeyStatusMap interface calls callback once for each key-value pair in the status map, in insertion order. If an argument is present it will be passed to the callback.
trans-unit.target: MediaKeyStatusMap 接口的 forEach 属性按插入顺序为状态图中的每个键值对调用一次回调。如果存在参数，它将被传递给回调。

trans-unit.source: The forcedReload flag changes how some browsers handle the user's scroll position. Usually reload() restores the scroll position afterward, but forced mode can scroll back to the top of the page, as if window.scrollY === 0.
trans-unit.target: 该 forcedReload 标志更改某些浏览器如何处理用户的滚动位置。通常 reload() 之后会恢复滚动位置，但是强制模式可以滚动回到页面顶部，就像 window.scrollY === 0 。

trans-unit.source: The form property can be the null value.
trans-unit.target: 该 form 属性可以是 null 值。

trans-unit.source: The formData() method of the Body mixin takes a Response stream and reads it to completion. It returns a promise that resolves with a FormData object.
trans-unit.target: Body mixin 的 formData() 方法获取一个 Response 流，并将其读取完成。它返回一个用 FormData 对象解析的Promise。

trans-unit.source: The format and internalformat parameters now accept gl.DEPTH_COMPONENT and gl.DEPTH_STENCIL.
trans-unit.target: 现在， format 和 internalformat 参数接受 gl.DEPTH_COMPONENT 和 gl.DEPTH_STENCIL 。

trans-unit.source: The forms read-only property of the Document interface returns an HTMLCollection listing all the <form> elements contained in the document.
trans-unit.target: Document 接口的 forms 只读属性返回一个 HTMLCollection ,其中列出了文档中包含的所有 <form> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The forwardX read-only property of the AudioListener interface is an AudioParam representing the x value of the direction vector defining the forward direction the listener is pointing in.
trans-unit.target: AudioListener 接口的 forwardX 只读属性是一个 AudioParam ,它表示方向向量的x值，该值定义了侦听器所指向的正向。

trans-unit.source: The forwardY read-only property of the AudioListener interface is an AudioParam representing the y value of the direction vector defining the forward direction the listener is pointing in.
trans-unit.target: AudioListener 接口的 forwardY 只读属性是一个 AudioParam ,它表示方向矢量的y值，该值定义了侦听器所指向的正向。

trans-unit.source: The forwardZ read-only property of the AudioListener interface is an AudioParam representing the z value of the direction vector defining the forward direction the listener is pointing in.
trans-unit.target: AudioListener 接口的 forwardZ 只读属性是一个 AudioParam ,它表示方向矢量的z值，该值定义了侦听器所指向的正向。

trans-unit.source: The frameRate constraint can be used to establish acceptable upper and lower bounds on the video frame rate for a new video track, or to specify an exact frame rate that must be provided for the request to succeed. Checking the value of this property lets you determine if the user agent allows constraining the video track configuration by frame rate. See the example to see how this can be used.
trans-unit.target: 的 frameRate 约束可以被用来建立在视频帧速率上可接受的上限和下限为一个新的视频轨道，或指定必须被提供用于请求成功一个确切的帧速率。通过检查此属性的值，可以确定用户代理是否允许按帧频限制视频轨道配置。请参见示例以了解如何使用它。

trans-unit.source: The framerate is the number of frames per one second of video.
trans-unit.target: 的 framerate 是每个视频中的一个第二框架的数量。

trans-unit.source: The frequency property of the BiquadFilterNode interface Is a k-rateAudioParam, a double representing a frequency in the current filtering algorithm measured in hertz (Hz).
trans-unit.target: BiquadFilterNode 接口的 frequency 属性是k速率 AudioParam ，一个双精度值，表示当前滤波算法中以赫兹（Hz）为单位的频率。

trans-unit.source: The frequency property of the OscillatorNode interface is an a-rateAudioParam representing the frequency of oscillation in hertz.
trans-unit.target: OscillatorNode 接口的 frequency 属性是a速率 AudioParam ,代表以赫兹为单位的振荡频率。

trans-unit.source: The frequencyBinCount read-only property of the AnalyserNode interface is an unsigned integer half that of the AnalyserNode.fftSize. This generally equates to the number of data values you will have to play with for the visualization.
trans-unit.target: 该 frequencyBinCount 只读财产 AnalyserNode 接口是，一个无符号整数半 AnalyserNode.fftSize 。这通常等于您必须为可视化使用的数据值的数量。

trans-unit.source: The fromRect() property of the DOMRectReadOnly interface creates a new DOMRectReadOnly object with a given location and dimensions.
trans-unit.target: DOMRectReadOnly 接口的 fromRect() 属性创建一个具有给定位置和尺寸的新 DOMRectReadOnly 对象。

trans-unit.source: The fullscreenElement property tells you the Element that's currently being displayed fullscreen. If this is non-null, the document is in fullscreen mode. If this is null, the document is not in fullscreen mode.
trans-unit.target: 该 fullscreenElement 属性告诉你的 Element ，因此目前正在全屏显示。如果这不是非null，则文档处于全屏模式。如果为空，则文档不处于全屏模式。
